ci_support_linux_64_ruby2.5.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '9'
cdt_name:
- cos6
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-comp7
ruby:
- '2.5'
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - cdt_name
  - docker_image

about.summary: Ruby C bindings to the excellent Yajl JSON stream-based parser library.

script: gem install -N -l -V --norc --ignore-dependencies -n $PREFIX/bin yajl-ruby-1.4.1.gem && gem unpack yajl-ruby-1.4.1.gem && make -C PREFIX/lib/ruby/gems/2.5.0/gems/yajl-ruby-1.4.1/ext/yajl clean
gem install -N -l -V --norc --ignore-dependencies -n $PREFIX/bin yajl-ruby-1.4.1.gem && gem unpack yajl-ruby-1.4.1.gem && make -C PREFIX/lib/ruby/gems/2.6.0/gems/yajl-ruby-1.4.1/ext/yajl clean

script: gem install -N -l -V --norc --ignore-dependencies -n $PREFIX/bin yajl-ruby-1.4.1.gem && gem unpack yajl-ruby-1.4.1.gem && make -C PREFIX/lib/ruby/gems/2.5.0/gems/yajl-ruby-1.4.1/ext/yajl clean
gem install -N -l -V --norc --ignore-dependencies -n $PREFIX/bin yajl-ruby-1.4.1.gem && gem unpack yajl-ruby-1.4.1.gem && make -C PREFIX/lib/ruby/gems/2.6.0/gems/yajl-ruby-1.4.1/ext/yajl clean

name: rb-yajl-ruby

about.summary: Ruby C bindings to the excellent Yajl JSON stream-based parser library.

script: gem install -N -l -V --norc --ignore-dependencies -n $PREFIX/bin yajl-ruby-1.4.1.gem && gem unpack yajl-ruby-1.4.1.gem && make -C PREFIX/lib/ruby/gems/2.5.0/gems/yajl-ruby-1.4.1/ext/yajl clean
gem install -N -l -V --norc --ignore-dependencies -n $PREFIX/bin yajl-ruby-1.4.1.gem && gem unpack yajl-ruby-1.4.1.gem && make -C PREFIX/lib/ruby/gems/2.6.0/gems/yajl-ruby-1.4.1/ext/yajl clean

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "yajl-ruby" %}
{% set version = "1.4.1" %}

package:
  name: rb-{{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://rubygems.org/downloads/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
  sha256: 6e32e6e681c2861e99e7389ebcca70d56cb9357b223f09fb0857e2444ee1609b

build:
  number: 1
  script:
    - gem install -N -l -V --norc --ignore-dependencies -n $PREFIX/bin {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
      && gem unpack {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
      && make -C {{ PREFIX }}/lib/ruby/gems/{{ ruby }}.0/gems/{{ name }}-{{ version }}/ext/yajl clean
  skip: {{ win }}

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
  host:
    - ruby
  run:
    - {{ pin_compatible('ruby', max_pin='x.x') }}

test:
  commands:
    - ruby -r yajl -e 'exit 0'

about:
  home: https://rubygems.org/gems/{{ name }}
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: {{ name }}-{{ version }}/LICENSE
  summary: Ruby C bindings to the excellent Yajl JSON stream-based parser library.
  doc_url: https://www.rubydoc.info/gems/{{ name }}
  dev_url: https://github.com/brianmario/yajl-ruby

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mxr-conda
    - conda-forge/ruby
